name: microtia
content:

a condition in which the outer ear is smaller than normal: Microtia is a genetic malformation of the auricle which affects 1 in every 8,000 infants. Unilateral microtia, in which one ear is missing, is more common.
More examplesFewer examplesMicrotia of the right ear is present; the left ear is normal, with no other dysmorphism.Doctors don't know what causes microtia, which literally means "little ear".Rib cartilage is often used for reconstruction of the microtia ear.
